rewrite1:

- Insert an 8-point space following the paragraph.

- Reduce the font size to 48 points. 
- Change the highlight color to maroon. 
- Remove any bold formatting from the text. 
- Align the text to the right. 
- Modify the Outline Level to Level 2.
